text: Villavicencio is a city in Colombia. It is the largest city and the capital of the Department of Meta. Villavicencio is on the great Colombianâ€“Venezuelan plain called Los Llanos. In 2005, 384,131 people lived there. the city was founded as in 1840. The city became the capital of the department in 1959. ==Sources== Category:Cities in Colombia Category:Capitals of Colombian departments Category:1840 establishments Category:19th-century establishments in Colombia Category:1840s establishments in South America
title: Villavicencio
